alert.note: Alert for Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 28 at 3:12AM PST until January 28 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Santa Monica Mountains. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Roadways that could be impacted by the gusty winds include canyon roads such as Kanan, Malibu Canyon, Topanga, and Decker Canyon.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
